title: Freezer Cocktails Are the Stress-Free Option We All Deserve Right Now
sub_head: With a batch of drinks ready in the freezer, happy hour is always imminent and parties are so much more fun to host. These recipes for the Martini, Manhattan, Negroni and more make mixology more user-friendly.
body:
THE FREEZER Martini has long been a pro move at bars: Pre-mix, decant into a bottle and super-chill to a velvety-cold, almost syrupy consistency, ready to pour the moment an order comes in. Throughout the pandemic, it’s been my best at-home hack, too, a real sanity saver at the end of an endless day when my energy is totally zapped.
There’s no reason to limit freezer mixology to Martinis, the bar experts say. Indeed, the latest book from one of America’s top cocktail destinations, “Death & Co: Welcome Home” (Ten Speed Press), includes a slew of recipes flagged (with a tiny snowflake icon) as ideal for the make-ahead deep-freeze treatment.
